features: NATURAL INGREDIENTS FOR A STREAK FREE, FLAWLESS GLOW – formulated with a blend of natural organic ingredients including aloe vera, argan oil, borage seed and orange peel extract to give you a healthy, flawless glow
NO FAKE TAN SMELL & EVEN FADE - No nasty fake tan smell when developing and no cracking or patchiness when fading

ECO CERTIFIED AND ORGANIC – TanOrganic Self Tanning Lotion is the worlds first and only Eco Certified self tan with full Vegan Society, Organic, Cruelty Free and Ethical Association certification with a 100 score.
ULTRA MOISTURING – aloe vera based to nourish, hydrate, revitalise and enhance the elasticity in your skin
SUITABLE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN – TanOrganics’ gentle natural organic ingredients makes this product suitable for sensitive skin, fair skin, face and body, men and women
description: Product Description About us... Our Products TanOrganic’s natural ingredients work gently on both your face and body to deliver stunning tanning results. Our products are specifically designed for people who want to look beautiful and feel confident , but want to know the products they use care about the environment . Our Ingredients The Skincare Tan. We use only the best 100% natural and organic ingredients . Our Aloe Vera rich products also help to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles as they actively nourish the skin , ensuring a perfect fade, unlike traditional water based tans. Our Mission From our ingredients to our packaging, we’re 100% ethical* and eco* certified. * Accredited by The Good Shopping Guide Ethical Companies Organization, Date: 10/08/2021. Ref: 4522153 *Accredited by Eco Cert, Date: 19/01/2021. Ref: IE-2021-121601-1153985 Our Purpose We’re participating in rePurpose Global’s One for One Impact Program. This means that for every TanOrganic bottle we sell, we’re funding to recover 1LB of ocean-bound plastic from the environment in Goa, India. Essentially, it only takes one TanOrganic purchase to remove 8 plastic tan bottles from the environment! Self-tan Oil Our super luxurious tanning oil is the perfect ally to those who want a quick and mess free tanning routine. It gives your skin the ultimate natural-looking, radiant glow that lasts for days and fades perfectly. The application couldn’t be easier, no glove is needed, apply with your hands as a moisturising body oil massaging your skin until fully absorbed. Shade: Light Self-tan Lotion TanOrganic Self Tan Lotion is 84% Aloe Vera based ensuring your skin is left hydrated and moisturised. It squeezing pure Organic Aloe Vera juice on your skin and this ensures your tan won’t dry and flake, and will fade perfectly. Ideal for sensitive Skin, TanOrganic is ideal for those with sensitive skin and also those who are pregnant or expecting as it is free from harsh chemicals, paraben’s, colours and fragrances. Shade: Medium Self-tan Mousse This amazing product is bursting with hydration and contains 80% organic Aloe Vera juice to ensure your skin is left hydrated and moisturized. This magical product has no synthetic ingredients, colours, dyes or drying agents in it but is packed with hyaluronic acid, moisturizing ingredients and natural food colouring that hydrate not dry out the skin. Shade: Medium/dark Facial Self-tan Oil TanOrganic Moisturising Facial Serum is a unique blend of 8 different natural plan oils including argan oil, borage seed oil and rosehip oil. Light and easily absorbed, this facial serum is ideal for all skin complexions and unlike traditional creams, its absorbed instantly. This serum is rich in vitamin E and antioxidants which hold the ability to regress the signs of ageing, erase wrinkles and other skin degenerations. Shade: Light Self-tan Oil Self-tan Lotion Self-tan Mousse Facial Self-tan Oil We are as kind to your skin as we are to the planet When you buy any bottle from the TanOrganic range, you're essentially funding the removal of... the weight of 8 plastic tan bottles, or.. the weight of 75 plastic shopping bags, or... the weight of 1080 plastic straws, or... the weight of 45 plastic water bottles A message from our founder Noelle O'Connor “At TanOrganic, we are as kind to your skin as we are to the planet . As pioneers in beauty, we recognize the magnitude of the industry’s plastic problem, and we acknowledge our responsibility to clean up after ourselves . We have one earth, and it’s our duty to look after it . Our planet needs us and TanOrganic is taking strong strides to protect her.” For every bottle sold, we're funding to recover 1LB of ocean-bound plastic from the environment We're providing 15 waste workers & their families with an additional income All of our products carry a zero plastic footprint. Instead we use glass, bamboo and sugar polymer packaging. FOR ALL TANKIND Formulated for all skin types, and ideal for those with sensitive skin, TanOrganic suits every skin complexion, and because its best applied in light layers it gives you the flexibility of a build-able color so you can easily adjust the intensity of your tan to suit your requirements.
